pamanager
Class FileAgent

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--ciagent.CIAgent
        |
        +--pamanager.FileAgent
public class FileAgent
extends CIAgent

The FileAgent class implements an agent that monitors a file to see if it was modified, deleted, or if its size exceeds a certain threshold.

See Also:
